lines.text:
[to Mack]
You remember Deputy Frank?... They had to scrape him off his bathroom ceiling with a shovel.
I gotta get this car into the shop... There's a ticking noise near the engine.

[Talking to Deputy Frank who just shot someone]
I'm talking about a guy that has a deep inbred tendacy to shoot a lot faster than he thinks... You're fired.

[to Dade McCrutchen]
Don't you know the biggest problem I have in catching them girls is you?

[Mack just got back into town]
What's the bad news?
Your truck is wanted in seven counties.

[Pa is drinking his moonshine]
Just make sure you're shippin' and not sippin'.
